name: Finflow
description: Theoretical teaching doesn't automatically make students knowledgeable about budgeting, investing, insurance, and loans and interest. Students need practice and today some companies and universities give them this opportunity: using different simulation tools students learn how their financial decisions impact businesses and get a deeper understanding of finance theories and concepts. Here's an example of how finance simulators could tell the world about themselves. https://dribbble.com/shots/16498138-Finflow-Finance-Simulation-Platform
